name: CLoset Connection
description:
Need a small office space or desk to get some work done but your out of space?  Convert a spare closet into a work area with Closet Connection. Neatly organized with a punch of color.  Take the doors off and hang some fabric to soften the look and for easy access.  

An easy DIY design solution for you. WIth a furniture budget and the price of the design this space can be yours. Tell all of your friends you designed and put it together yourself!

Purchase Jane Gianarelli's Idea Kit and receive: 
1. A shopping lists with links. 
2. Benjamin Moore paint colors options.
3. Elevations that show placement.

You choose what pieces to purchase and how much you want to spend, it's all up to YOU! Implement the design and take all of the credit.

Starting at $199 for the design concept, choose how much you want to spend on merchandise, all of it or some of it. Then you implement the design.

For more detailed photos go to--> https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.169599003194718.1073741829.152698244884794&type=3

*Pricing & availability is subject to change without prior notice

name: Fireside Seating
description:
Chic style seating by the firelight.  A soft palette of relaxing tones to set the mood for any conversation or gathering. 

This design can be yours for a design fee of $199 + the price of products at a retail totaling around $7000.  Get the shopping list and you can pick and choose just how many pieces you want to purchase.  You control your spending budget and implement the design yourself! Tell your friends you designed it and receive all the accolades. You are the designer, no one needs to know.  

Shopping list, Benjamin Moore paints, floor plan and elevations are included. 

*pricing & availability of products are subject to change
